website_summaries.verdict: A unique sun cover that provides great shade and insect protection.
pros: Sun cover is a dark color, preventing it from reflecting sunlight onto people nearby
Shade also provides UVA and UVB ray protection
Insect net does a good job of keeping harmful mosquitoes out of the stroller
cons: Lacks a proper rain cover to keep moisture out

customer_reviews.title: I really like this fitted mosquito cover (that's what we use it ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this fitted mosquito cover (that's what we use it for more than a sun shade), but it does have a few areas that remain accessible even when snuggly zipped. It's nothing a little clamp on the sides can't fix, though. Not a big deal. There's also a very small open area right at the bottom near the foot rest. If you live in any normal kind of environment, this is not a deal-breaker. We live in a marshy riverside area and it does see some significant bug life. Even so, he's never been bitten. I just stuff a small blanket or t-shirt down there and we're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Cover is for pre 2015 buggy
customer_reviews.text: This is the pre 2015 buggy cover. Description of item and photo did not stipulate that so had to return
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This sun cover is fantastic and very well thought out. It does its job to keep the sun out of my son's eyes and integrates nicely with the stroller. It also comes with a little storage pouch that we attach to the top of the stroller and provides extra storage when the sun shade is being used.
customer_reviews.author: Francis K.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great design and works wonderfully with the stroller. Easy to use and stored easily. Pricy but worth the money and I am glad I went for it.
customer_reviews.author: NYC fairchild

customer_reviews.title: Love that it provides shade for my little one so ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that it provides shade for my little one so I don't have to worry about sunscreen for a short walk!
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: This product works as advertised. It does an excellent job keeping the sun off and integrates nicely into the stroller so it does not look like an addon part. It also somewhat functions as bug protection, but there are a number of gaps. My only complaint is that the stroller will not fold up unless you unhook the bottom of the cover. I see no need to ever take this off, so that is a bit of a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tindall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Best sun cover for the mountains terrain buggy! It keeps the sun and the bugs out. Easy to put on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain22

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: This only fit my terrain when the canopy was pulled all the way down. I don't know if I can still return it but I wouldn't buy mountain buggy accessories on amazon after this.
customer_reviews.author: Ivadell

customer_reviews.title: Provides great shade for the passenger.
customer_reviews.text: Provides great shade for the passenger and also servers as a way to block some wind. Additionally have found it useful for keeping passenger's toys inside the stroller as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Protects our child
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because our son kept getting exposed to the sun while we were running. The hood on the running stroller doesn't provide a lot of sun protection. The sun cover does a decent job of cutting down on sun exposure. Enough that it makes it worth it. The only negative I can find is that it creates a noticeable amount of extra wind resistance. We still use it because it's worth the extra sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Medicguy

product_meta.title: Mountain Buggy Urban Jungle/Terrain Sun Cover, Mesh
product_meta.description:
Protects from bugs and sun tested to UPF rating of over 50 for sun protection. Custom fit, strong but lightweight mesh material. Easy to attach and easy to access child with zip opening. Folds into small bag to fit in storage tray.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Protects from bugs and sun with 81% UV filtering. Custom fit, strong but lightweight mesh material. Easy to attach and easy to access child with zip opening. Folds into small bag to fit in storage tray.
feature_bullets: Compatible with Urban Jungle or Terrain buggies only
Durable and hard wearing yet light weight and stores in a small bag to fit in storage tray
Protects from bugs and sun with UV filtering mesh material
Easy access to child with zip open and roll up frontage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.5 out of 5 stars14 ratings2.5 out of 5 stars
